AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: passenger in the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: driver of the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop, interacted with Luis Pena
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: United States Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door and asked Zeba Williams to open it
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine, Aroxa, perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior steps
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Aroxa: canine used by Manuel Hernandez for inspection at the immigration checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.immigration checkpoint stop: location where Ramon De La Cruz and Zeba Williams were stopped by United States Border Patrol Agents
